_sText:
------------------------------
Surf_amplitude_encore -- (#2 of the amplitude series)
Map created by Buck Nasty
Jail created by FAJ
------------------------------

This map is skill surf with 2 endings: 
-The first ending rewards you with the ability to nade the other team that is in jail from a sheltered bunker.
- The second ending rewards you with multiple torture options.

-The map follows a time release which will release the prisoners from jail every 30 seconds for the first minute; to give the players another chance to beat the map. 

-Both teams spawn together without any weapons (no pistols or knives).

-Lastly I'd like to thank the beta testers and especially FAJ for the jail and Roosta for contributing a piece of surf.

-Comments are always welcome, including constructive criticism!

Enjoy!
--Buck Nasty

http://forums.solidsurf.info/
http://cstrike.waspnest.net/
http://ny.readytogame.com/
